notes:
The strongest version of a [[Rotworm]], it seems to spawn randomly in [[Rotworm]] and [[Carrion Worm]] Caves.
[[The Sacred Casket (Book)]] says that the substance inside the [[Jewel Case (Nomad)]] can potentially attract these creatures, as it has already proven to attract regular [[Rotworm]]s and [[Carrion Worm]]s. This is a reference to the [[Wikipedia:Dune|Dune]] series of books wherein desert-dwelling sandworms, on which rotworms are based, are heavily attracted to melange spice.
history: Until the patch [[Updates/13.12.13018|13.12.13018]] Rotworm Queens could be convinced, and were the only boss that could be.
name: Rotworm Queen
behaviour: Acts much like a [[Carrion Worm]]. Appears with 2 [[Carrion Worm]]s and 3 [[Rotworm]]s.
location: [[Darashia Rotworm Caves]] around {{Mapper Coords|129.38|126.116|9|4|text=here}}, [[Edron Rotworm Cave]] {{Mapper Coords|129.208|124.104|9|4|text=here}}, [[Vandura Rotworm Cave|Liberty Bay Rotworm Cave]] (around {{Mapper Coords|126.5|127.178|10|4|text=here}}), [[Hellgate]] (around {{Mapper Coords|128.6|123.108|12|2|text=here}}).
strategy: No strategy needed. Treat it like a [[Carrion Worm]]. Recommended to be level 16 before trying to kill one.
